sig_info: Each time Thor inflicts a personal Shock Effect on the opponent, she also has a 100% chance to Nullify all Power Gain Buffs on them. Additionally, while the opponent has at least one Shock Effect on them, they suffer -40 to 75% Ability Power Rate.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: The power of Mjölnir grants Thor +1362.96 Energy Resistance and causes enemy Shock effects to suffer -100% Potency. While fighting Science Champions, this reduction drops to -20% Potency.
WHILE THE OPPONENT IS SHOCKED: Thor gains +30% Perfect Block Chance.
Attacks have a 21% chance to inflict a 2.10 second Stun Debuff.
WHILE THE OPPONENT IS STUNNED: Thor’s attacks strike with Guaranteed Critical Hits and gain +824.24 Critical Damage Rating.
Thor benefits from Rank 3 of the Petrify Mastery, even if it is not activated. For each Rank that is activated, she gains +8.3 Attack Rating.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflicts up to 2 Stagger Passives on the opponent lasting 17 seconds. 100% chance each.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 112.05 Energy Damage over 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff causing 132.8 Energy Damage over 12 seconds. This Shock becomes Passive while fighting Cosmic Champions.
This Shock is Paused for 7 second(s) each time a Buff on the opponent is Nullified.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Passive, causing 219.95 Energy Damage over 13 seconds. This Shock is Paused for 0.50 seconds each time the opponent is Stunned.

Attacks have a 21% chance to inflict a 2.10 second Stun Debuff.
WHILE THE OPPONENT IS STUNNED: Thor’s attacks strike with Guaranteed Critical Hits and gain +1133.33 Critical Damage Rating.
Thor benefits from Rank 3 of the Petrify Mastery, even if it is not activated. For each Rank that is activated, she gains +339.3 Attack Rating.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflicts up to 2 Stagger Passives on the opponent lasting 17 seconds. 100% chance each.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, causing 4580.55 Energy Damage over 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff causing 5428.8 Energy Damage over 12 seconds. This Shock becomes Passive while fighting Cosmic Champions.
This Shock is Paused for 7 second(s) each time a Buff on the opponent is Nullified.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Passive, causing 8991.45 Energy Damage over 13 seconds. This Shock is Paused for 0.50 seconds each time the opponent is Stunned.

sig_info: Each time Thor inflicts a personal Shock Effect on the opponent, she also has a 100% chance to Nullify all Power Gain Buffs on them. Additionally, while the opponent has at least one Shock Effect on them, they suffer -45 to 80% Ability Power Rate.
